text:
This was my first visit, and it was definitely a great spot for a satisfying and enjoyable Mookata experience! I loved the wide variety of ingredients, from fresh meats and seafood to vegetables. The marinated meats were especially flavourful, and the dipping sauces added the perfect kick to every bite.

The service here is excellent—the staff is friendly, attentive, and always ready to assist. At just $14.90 for a protein buffet with generous portions and a great selection, it's definitely great value for money.

Whether you're a Mookata fan or trying it for the first time, this is a place worth visiting. Highly recommended!

Most affordable Mookata I’ve ever tried in SG! Only $14.90 for unlimited food! Though cheap, quality is not compromised!

We were quite impressed by the variety of choices and the marination of meats here! There are quite a lot to select from but one of our favourites is the Mala and Tom Yum chicken! Tender, delicious and spicy! If you prefer, top up an additional $5 to enjoy free flow seafood too!! Totally value for money!

Absolutely love 𝙁𝙖𝙢𝙞𝙡𝙮 𝙈𝙤𝙤𝙠𝙖𝙩𝙖! This place is a real gem if you're looking for a 𝙬𝙖𝙡𝙡𝙚𝙩-𝙛𝙧𝙞𝙚𝙣𝙙𝙡𝙮 buffet with tons of variety. For just $𝟙𝟜.𝟡𝟘, you get an 𝙪𝙣𝙡𝙞𝙢𝙞𝙩𝙚𝙙 𝙥𝙧𝙤𝙩𝙚𝙞𝙣 𝙗𝙪𝙛𝙛𝙚𝙩 with a great selection of 𝙢𝙖𝙧𝙞𝙣𝙖𝙩𝙚𝙙 𝙢𝙚𝙖𝙩𝙨, 𝙫𝙚𝙜𝙜𝙞𝙚𝙨, 𝙖𝙣𝙙 𝙢𝙤𝙧𝙚.. Add just $5 𝙢𝙤𝙧𝙚 and you unlock the 𝙨𝙚𝙖𝙛𝙤𝙤𝙙 𝙗𝙪𝙛𝙛𝙚𝙩 — best of both worlds!

What really stood out to me was the 𝙝𝙤𝙢𝙚𝙢𝙖𝙙𝙚 𝙏𝙝𝙖𝙞 𝙘𝙝𝙞𝙡𝙡𝙞 𝙙𝙞𝙥— spicy, tangy, and incredibly 𝙨𝙝𝙞𝙤𝙠 with the BBQ meats. And the biggest surprise? 𝙏𝙝𝙚𝙮 𝙝𝙖𝙫𝙚 𝙤𝙮𝙨𝙩𝙚𝙧𝙨 𝙬𝙝𝙞𝙘𝙝 𝙖𝙧𝙚 𝙢𝙮 𝙛𝙖𝙫𝙤𝙪𝙧𝙞𝙩𝙚. That alone makes it superbly worth the price.

Highly recommend giving this place a try. You won’t be disappointed!

The new buffet spot offering all-you-can-eat meats, seafood, veggies and more. The best part? It’s super affordable, so you can enjoy a big meal without worrying about the cost! 😋 It’s the perfect place to relax, grill, and enjoy good food with your loved ones and friends 🍽️🔥.
Service is good, friendly and attentive staff 👍🏻

Food is great value for money, staff are helpful and kind. Variety of meat is limited but well worth the price we paid for.

Will definitely come back to eat again. Highly recommended.
